attributes.action: Allow free prescriptions for Lupus sufferers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I beleive that being a Lupus sufferer along with thousands more we should be able to receive free prescriptions
I take 12 medications daily to keep my condition stable & will have to for the rest of my life or until a cure is found Along with thousands of other sufferers I beleive we should be exempt from charges like similar conditions that are exempt
